member.summary: Creates a new instance of without any data in it.

member.summary: Adds new property to the data artifact.
member.remarks: In case property name contains nesting separator - property will be treated as property of the sub-document.

member.name: T:AssemblyRef
member.summary: Sets public key string for friend assemblies.

member.name: F:AssemblyRef.ProductPublicKey
member.summary: ProductPublicKey is an official MS supported public key for external releases. TestPublicKey is an unsupported strong key for testing and internal use only
